name: Ringway
description:
A simple puzzle game about ring based movement. The only controls are right mouse button which swaps directions and left mouse button which moves you onto a ring tangential to your own. Avoid the enemies to collect the keys to make it to the goal and the next level!

This is a game made for the September 2018 RPI Game Development Club game jam! I worked on it for about about half the time, but I'm still pretty proud of it.

I've uploaded the game jam version of the game (which unfortunately has some bugs and only two levels), and I'm working on finishing up a better version with new levels.
